content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest (41.5, -80.5) containing 229 coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Production Line 1 at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5) moving items to output chest

### Iron Production Line 2 at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing 61 iron plates
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5) moving items to output chest

### Power Generation System at position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Multiple electricity poles forming electricity network (id=14519)

### Automation Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5) containing 4 automation science packs
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

### Research Lab System
Consists of:
- Lab (position not specified)
- Currently researching logistics technology

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the chest coordinates are correct when trying to extract items

### Errors when trying to research already completed technology
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it
- Implement proper technology tree progression checks

### Production line stalling issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials
- Check for proper connection of all production line components

### Resource shortage handling
- Implement better resource monitoring
- Ensure proper supply chain for all required materials before starting production
- Monitor assembling machine ingredient requirements
